H0.text: Anemometer is the device used to determine the volume of a liquid.

H1.text: A graduated cylinder is a device used to determine the volume of a liquid.

H2.text: A test tube is the device used to determine the volume of a liquid.

H3.text: Thermometer is the device used to determine the volume of a liquid.

A4.text: Graduated cylinders are often used to measure the volume of a liquid.

A5.text: A graduated cylinder is a common piece of laboratory equipment used to measure the volume of a liquid.
